file_insights.description: Comprehensive collection of models for narrative-driven life event collections

gotchas_discovered: Complex model relationships require careful management
Multiple nullable and optional fields increase model complexity
Extensive use of UUID and foreign key relationships
discoveries.approach_outcome: SUCCESSFUL implementation of comprehensive collection models with rich narrative metadata
recommendations: Consider performance implications of complex relationships
Create comprehensive database migrations to support these models
Develop validation logic for the complex model interactions
Consider implementing custom validation for narrative metadata fields
